article_title: 'We are not afraid of war' Hezbollah warns Israel
sentence: Saleh  al-Arouri  died  in  a  drone  attack  in  Beirut  on  Tuesday.

article_title: 'We are not afraid of war' Hezbollah warns Israel
sentence: The  attack  that  killed  Arouri  was  the  first  in  Beirut  following  months  of  exchanges  of  fire  between  Iranian-backed  Hezbollah  and  Israel,  in  response  to  the  war  in  Gaza.

article_title: 'We are not afraid of war' Hezbollah warns Israel
sentence: US  State  Department  spokesman  Matthew  Miller  said  on  Wednesday  that  Washington  was  not  given  advance  notice  of  the  strike  in  Beirut  that  killed  Arouri.

article_title: 'We are not afraid of war' Hezbollah warns Israel
sentence: The  UN  said  five  people  were  killed  in  an  attack  on  the  Palestinian  Red  Crescent  building  in  the  southern  city  of  Khan  Younis  on  Tuesday,  as  Israel  urged  people  to  evacuate.

article_title: 'We are not afraid of war' Hezbollah warns Israel
sentence: A  five-day  old  baby  was  among  the  dead,  according  to  a  spokeswoman  for  the  United  Nations  Office  for  the  Coordination  of  Humanitarian  Affairs  (OCHA).

article_title: 'We are not afraid of war' Hezbollah warns Israel
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza  says  more  than  22,000  people  have  been  killed  in  the  territory  since  Israel  started  its  retaliatory  campaign.

article_title: 'We are not afraid of war' Hezbollah warns Israel
sentence: At  least  1,200  people  were  killed  when  Hamas  attacked  Israel  on  7  October  and  about  240  others  were  taken  hostage.
